Subject: Media Arts
Text: By the end of the Foundation year, students describe experiences, observations, ideas and/or feelings about arts works they encounter at school, home and/or in the community.
Keywords: foundation, year, students, describe, experiences, observations, ideas, feelings

Subject: Media Arts
Text: Students use play, imagination, arts knowledge, processes and/or skills to create and share arts works in different forms.
Keywords: arts, students, play, imagination, knowledge, processes, skills, create

Subject: Media Arts
Text: By the end of Year 2, students identify where they experience media arts.
Keywords: year, students, identify, experience, media, arts

Subject: Media Arts
Text: They describe where, why and/or how people across cultures, communities and/or other contexts experience media arts.
Keywords: describe, people, cultures, communities, other, contexts, experience, media

Subject: Media Arts
Text: Students use media languages and media technologies to construct representations in media arts works.
Keywords: media, students, languages, technologies, construct, representations, arts, works

Subject: Media Arts
Text: They share their work with audiences safely and in informal ways.
Keywords: share, work, audiences, safely, informal, ways

Subject: Media Arts
Text: By the end of Year 4, students describe the use of media languages and media technologies to construct representations in media arts works they experience and/or produce.
Keywords: media, year, students, describe, languages, technologies, construct, representations

Subject: Media Arts
Text: They describe where, why and/or how media arts works are created and/or distributed across cultures, times, places and/or other contexts.
Keywords: describe, media, arts, works, created, distributed, cultures, times

Subject: Media Arts
Text: Students use media languages, and media technologies and production processes to construct representations in media arts works.
Keywords: media, students, languages, technologies, production, processes, construct, representations

Subject: Media Arts
Text: They share their work in informal settings using responsible media practice.
Keywords: share, work, informal, settings, responsible, media, practice

Subject: Media Arts
Text: By the end of Year 6, students explain how media languages and media technologies are used in media arts works they construct and/or experience.
Keywords: media, year, students, explain, languages, technologies, used, arts

Subject: Media Arts
Text: They describe how media arts works created across cultures, times, places and/or other contexts communicate ideas, perspectives and/or meaning.
Keywords: describe, media, arts, works, created, cultures, times, places

Subject: Media Arts
Text: They describe how media arts are used to continue and revitalise cultures.
Keywords: describe, media, arts, used, continue, revitalise, cultures

Subject: Media Arts
Text: Students use media languages, and media technologies and production processes to construct representations in media arts works for specific purposes and audiences.
Keywords: media, students, languages, technologies, production, processes, construct, representations

Subject: Media Arts
Text: They present their work in informal and/or formal settings using responsible media practice.
Keywords: present, work, informal, formal, settings, responsible, media, practice
